column1: #Text=Man says : " Yeah , a little barefoot blind girl and her friends passed through here a few days ago . "
#Text=Yu says : " Did they give you any indication where they were headed ? "
#Text=Man says : " Maybe you could give me a little incentive ? "
#Text=Xin Fu says : " You suggesting I break your fingers ? "
#Text=Man says : " They went in the desert !
#Text=I 'm certain her father wants her alive .
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Hey , look ... Fire Nation wanted posters !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " So , look who 's here .
